title: Corporate Corruption
story: In the quiet town of Elmwood, strange occurrences have been reported.
Residents have noticed an increase in suspicious behavior by employees of InterTech Industries, a powerful tech company located on the outskirts of town.
Rumors of corporate corruption and unethical practices have been swirling around, but no concrete evidence has been found.
As a investigative reporter, you decide to dig deeper into the matter and uncover the truth behind InterTech's operations.

suspect.name: Steven Rodriguez
suspect.alibi: Steven claims to have been at the company's headquarters on the day of the incident, working in his office.
suspect.confirmation: Steven's alibi is confirmed by several co-workers who saw him at the office.

witness.name: Emily Hayes
witness.observation: Emily, a former employee of InterTech, noticed unusual financial transactions, secretive meetings, and employees being pressured to sign non-disclosure agreements.
witness.description: Emily is a reliable witness as she has documents proving her claims and worked at InterTech for several years.

npcs.name: Thomas Mitchell
npcs.dialogue: Thomas is the CEO of InterTech Industries. He vehemently denies all accusations and portrays the company as an innovator and industry leader.

npcs.name: Amy Johnson
npcs.dialogue: Amy is a current employee at InterTech. She expresses concern about the company's shady practices but fears retaliation if she speaks up.

clues.Company Memo: A confidential memo circulating among employees highlights financial irregularities and potential wrongdoing within the company.
clues.Bank Statements: Bank statements reveal large sums of money being transferred to offshore accounts linked to key executives
clues.Hidden Camera Footage: Inspecting the CEO's office, you find footage of secret meetings with government officials discussing illegal activities.
clues.Whistleblower Email: An anonymous email from an insider exposes the company's plan to engage in corporate espionage and sabotage competitors.
